response.original_title: Between the Colony and the Stars
response.overview: Estelar works in a psychiatric hospital and has visions of the past of the neighborhood where she lives and works: at Colônia Juliano Moreira, in Rio de Janeiro. During a water crisis in the state, she welcomes Kalil - her younger brother - to live in her house, once he has been approved at the public university to study music in her city. Amidst the political absurdities that surround Brazil, Estelar will realize that it takes courage to review her conservatives speeches and positions, that in the heart of the world reside all the differences, all times, abysses, mysteries between us.
response.title: Between the Colony and the Stars
